name: ab-download-manager-browser-integration
author: AmirHossein Abdolmotallebi
description: Download files with AB Download Manager app

scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.watch:chrome: cross-env EXTENSION_TARGET=chrome vite build --watch --mode development --minify false
scripts.watch:firefox: cross-env EXTENSION_TARGET=firefox vite build --watch --mode development --minify false
scripts.pack:firefox: npm run build:firefox && web-ext build --source-dir ./dist/firefox --artifacts-dir ./dist --filename firefox.zip
scripts.pack:chrome: npm run build:chrome && web-ext build --source-dir ./dist/chrome --artifacts-dir ./dist --filename chrome.zip
scripts.pack: npm run pack:chrome && npm run pack:firefox && npm run pack:src
